useCase.name: Perform ATM Transaction
useCase.description: Allows the customer to perform various transactions using the ATM machine

mainSequence.step: Insert Card - User inserts the card into the ATM
Enter PIN - User enters the PIN
Verify PIN - ATM verifies the entered PIN with the Bank system
PIN Verified - ATM confirms the PIN is valid
Select Balance Inquiry - User chooses to check balance
Request Balance - ATM requests balance information from the Bank
Balance Data - Bank provides the balance information
Display Balance - ATM displays the balance to the User
Select Withdrawal - User selects to withdraw money
Request Withdrawal - ATM requests withdrawal from the Bank
Validate Funds - Bank checks if the User has enough funds
Enter Amount - User enters the withdrawal amount
Confirm Withdrawal - User confirms the withdrawal
Process Withdrawal - ATM processes the withdrawal request
Withdrawal Approved - Bank approves the withdrawal
Dispense Cash - ATM dispenses cash to the User
Process Withdrawal - ATM processes the withdrawal due to insufficient funds
Insufficient Funds - ATM notifies User of insufficient funds
Select Cancel - User cancels the transaction
Transaction Canceled - ATM cancels the transaction
Remove Card - User removes the card from the ATM
